text: @realDonaldTrump How can "someone"  use the word "fiasco"  as he minimized from day one the coronavirus, what he qualified as a simple flue, without giving medical care insurance for EVERY single American dismantling what Obama started to put in place. Be safe, stay home, be strong  Americans ❤
